Translations.Text: Jingwei de renmen bi you yizhong shouhuo,
he liang ru yuanrun, nianling huayi de shaonu,
Tamen zai na limian ting bu dao e yan he huanghua.
Na shi cong ni de zhu fachu de baochou——chongzu de shangci.
Ta shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, shi zhiren de zhu, tamen bu gan xiang ta chen shuo.
Zai jingshen he zhong tianshen pai ban suli zhi ri, tamen bude shuohua, wei zhiren zhu suo texu erqie neng shuo zheng hua de, cai gan fayan.
Na shi bi you de rizi, shui yiyu, shui jiu ze qu yige xiang ta de zhu de guisu.
Wo dique jinggao nimen yizhong linjin de xingfa, zai na ri, geren jiangyao kanjian ziji suo yi zuo de gongzuo, bu xindao de renmen jiangyao shuo:`A! Dan yuan wo yuan shi chentu.'
